---
title: "Submit for approval"
date: last-modified
---


When your documentation project is ready, verify the approval workflow configured by an administrator and then submit your model documentation or validation report for review and approval.

## Prerequisites

* You hold the `Developer` role and are ready to submit your model documentation for review
* You hold the `Validator` role and are reato submit their validation report for review
* The model you are documenting is registered in the model inventory
* For Model Developers submitting their documentation for review: model documentation is complete
* For Model Validators submitting their validation report for review: validation report is complete

## View the current status and workflow

1. On the **Documentation Projects** page, select a project.

   On the **Overview** page, the current status of the project is displayed under **Status**.
<!--- **Need image** --->

3. Click **See workflow** under **Status** to visualize the entire workflow that this project will go through.
<!--- **Need image** --->

## Submit for review, for validation, or to advance to a workflow

1. On the **Documentation Projects** page, select a project.

2. Under **Actions** on the right, initiate the transition from the current state to the next workflow state. 

   For example, change the state from `In Documentation` to `In Validation` to indicate that a model developer has completed the initial model documentation  and is ready to go through the model validation step. 
<!--- **Need image** --->

::: {.column-margin}
::: {.callout-tip}
Workflow states and transitions can only be configured by an administrator.
:::
:::
